meta_title: Gantt Chart Definition: Industrial Maintenance Scheduling
meta_description: A Gantt chart is a visual scheduling tool mapping maintenance tasks against time. Understand how it optimizes asset downtime and coordinates complex work orders.
title: What Is a Gantt Chart?
